item.title: Nepal Dayanand Vedic Mission Global Academy
item.description: The DVM (Dayanand Vedic Mission) Educational & Charitable Management Society, New Delhi is an organization of the eminent persons from the fields of Arya Samaj, Education, Social Services, Administration, Judiciary, Business & Industries, dedicated to the cause of teachings of Vedic Mission shown by Swami Dayanand Saraswati, Founder of the Arya Samaj.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Namuna Vidya - Mandir
item.description: Namuna Vidya-Mandir (NVM) was established in 2050 B.S. along with a rented building. It has come a long way in the field of both educational and economical standard because it has been able to set up its own new building at Madhumara (Peepal Chowk) and classes from Nursery to Standard Ten are regularly going on. Besides, classes from Nursery to five are also running in Devkota Chowk. Believing that "Knowledge is Power" NVM has also been able to touch the hearts of all by providing imparting quality education and by having 100% SLC result, 2054.
item.dc:creator: superadmin
